channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游리 11:48 PM threats of artobrats in Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community. Consider, alarm is still in:- Dnipropetrovsk region
item.description: 游리 11:48 PM threats of artobrats in Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community. Consider, alarm is still in:- Dnipropetrovsk region#m_nikopol_that_nikopol. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
